overview: With more than 25 years of senior sales management experience, Ken Edoff has overseen domestic and international sales organizations, and developed profitable relationships with global OEMs, distributors, and channel partners. Edoff joined the Omni-ID executive team in 2008 after serving as Vice President of Worldwide Channel Sales at ZANTAZ, Inc., a major email archiving software company. He managed and grew ZANTAZ’ channel organization from a start-up initiative to a significant contributor to corporate revenue. Edoff has a diverse background with semiconductor and embedded software companies, having previously served in VP-level sales positions at Wind River Systems, SanDisk Corp., and Cyrix Corp. He currently sits on the Advisory Board for a data security company. Edoff holds a bachelor of science degree in Communications Management from Temple University.
